content: repeat from * around 12 sts round 30 *k2tog* 6 sts finishing break yarn leaving a 12 tail and finish stuffing egg if needed thread tail through eye of a tapestry needle transfer remaining stitches to the tapestry needle pulling them tight i like to go through the last 6 sts twice for extra strength weave in end then go to the other end of the egg use yarn tail there to sew the end shut securely and weave in end pattern courtesy of kerry robb and little gnome knits for personal use only thank you kindly etsy com/shop/littlegnomeknits www littlegnomeknits com
